alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clarendon; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 6:52PM EDT until August 07 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Clarendon County in central South Carolina... Central Sumter County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 652 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Eastover to near Poinsett State Park to 11 miles east of St. Matthews to 9 miles northwest of Santee State Park to 7 miles northwest of Elloree, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Sumter, Manning, South Sumter, Summerton, Alcolu, Woods Bay State Park, Santee Cooper Regional Airport, Poinsett State Park, Turbeville, Pinewood, Paxville, Cane Savannah, Rimini, Brogdon, Lone Star, Low Falls Landing, St. Paul, Lakewood, Privateer, and Foreston. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 106 and 139. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
